title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This revolutionary device is designed to effortlessly tackle all your cleaning needs, from hard floors to area rugs. With its sleek black design and advanced features, it's the perfect addition to any home.

Featuring a rotating brush system, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max ensures deep and thorough cleaning. Its wide cleaning path width of 10.5 inches allows you to cover more ground in less time. Say goodbye to cumbersome cords with its cordless design, providing you with the freedom to clean anywhere without restrictions.

Equipped with a powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, this vacuum cleaner and mop combo offers up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time. The improved edge cleaning capabilities ensure no dust or dirt is left behind, giving your home a truly spotless finish. 

Connectivity is made easy with the built-in WiFi capabilities, allowing you to stay connected and in control of your cleaning routine. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max also features a self-cleaning cycle, making maintenance a breeze. 

This versatile device is compatible with a wide range of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. It even supports a great cause, as a portion of the proceeds goes to the BISSELL Pet Foundation.

With your purchase, you'll receive 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, ensuring you have everything you need to achieve professional-grade cleaning results.

Upgrade your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Experience the convenience, power, and efficiency it offers, and enjoy a cleaner, fresher home.

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, the ultimate cleaning solution for your hard floors and area rugs! This sleek and powerful device is designed to make your cleaning routine a breeze while delivering exceptional results. 

Featuring a rotating brush system and a wide cleaning path width of 10.5 inches, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max effortlessly tackles dirt, debris, and pet hair, leaving your floors spotless. With its improved edge cleaning capabilities, no corner or crevice will be left untouched. 

Say goodbye to the hassle of cords and enjoy the freedom of cordless cleaning! Powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, this vacuum cleaner and mop provides up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning, ensuring you can cover every inch of your home. 

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is not just a cleaning powerhouse, but it also supports a great cause. With every purchase, you are contributing to the BISSELL Pet Foundation, making a difference in the lives of animals in need. 

Compatible with a variety of surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs, this all-in-one cleaner is versatile and efficient. 

With its swivel head and carry handle, maneuvering around furniture and transporting the device from room to room is a breeze. The clean tank has a capacity of 28 oz for water and 18.6 oz for dirt, minimizing the need for frequent refills. 

Stay connected and in control with the BISSELL Connect app compatibility. You can monitor your cleaning progress, schedule cleanings, and even receive maintenance reminders right from your smartphone. 

Experience the convenience of self-cleaning with the self-cleaning cycle feature, ensuring your device stays in optimal condition. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max also features two-tank technology, keeping clean and dirty water separate for a more hygienic cleaning experience. 

With the purchase of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, you will receive 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, providing you with everything you need to achieve a pristine clean. 

Invest in the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop and revolutionize your cleaning routine today! Not only will you enjoy a cleaner home, but you'll also be supporting a worthy cause.
